references.paper_title: Frozen in time: A joint video and image encoder for end-to-end retrieval
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the efficient retrieval of video and image data, which is crucial for the training of the GS-DiT model.

references.paper_title: Structure and content-guided video synthesis with diffusion models
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the use of diffusion models in video synthesis, providing a baseline for the GS-DiT model's video generation capabilities.

references.paper_title: Video generation models as world simulators
references.reason: This work introduces the concept of video generation models as world simulators, which is essential for the 4D video control capabilities of the GS-DiT model.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper significantly advances image generation techniques, enabling the high-quality video generation achieved by the GS-DiT model.

references.paper_title: Imagen video: High definition video generation with diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is a pioneering work in high-definition video generation using diffusion models, which serves as a basis for improving the video generation quality of the GS-DiT model.
